text: When we look to the individuals of the same variety or sub-variety of our older cultivated plants and animals, one of the first points which strikes us is that they generally differ much more from each other than do the individuals of any one species or variety in a state of nature. When we look to individuals of the same or other older cultivated plants and animals, one of the first which strikes us is that generally differ much more from each other than do the individuals of one species or variety in a state of nature.
